data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Males, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LOPB [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, ROPB [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LBIB [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RBIB [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LINB [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RINB [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: LOPBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOPBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROPBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBIBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBIBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBWT45
variable.description: Weight for LINBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBWT45
variable.description: Weight for RINBRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: MNB45_1
variable.description: Mean of the RT45 variables [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 2]
